properties.comment: These are the preamble snippets needed by class LocSetHandler in this package
properties.entry: (assert (forall ((o U) (f U) (h U)) (! (= (elementOf o f (freshLocs h)) (and (not (= o null)) (not (= (cast (keyselect h o |KeY_java.lang.Object::<created>|) sort_boolean) (b2u true))))) :pattern ((elementOf o f (freshLocs h))))))
(assert (forall ((o U) (f U)) (! (not (elementOf o f empty)) :pattern ((elementOf o f empty)))))
\forall Object o; \forall Field f; \forall LocSet l1; \forall LocSet l2; (elementOf(o, f, union(l1, l2)) <-> elementOf(o,f,l1) | elementOf(o,f,l2))
